Your Financial Advocates For Life

Who we serve

Widowed or Divorced

Ultra High Net Worth

Retirement Transition

Inheriting Wealth

Retirement Transition
We guide clients through the various challenges of shifting from the accumulation phase of life to the distribution phase… namely the significant impact it [should] have on the client’s investment strategy, distribution strategy, social security elections, insurance coverage, and mortgage financing.
Widowed or divorced
These difficult life events can leave a man or woman in a new position of financial responsibility after relying upon a spouse for many years to handle the finances. We help these clients get comfortable in their new role. These individuals are common targets for financial abuse. Having us as an advocate can prevent these people from becoming targets.
Ultra High Net Worth
Ultra-high net worth clients seem to value two things more than anything else – (1) trustworthiness and (2) convenience. We partner with skilled accounting professionals to coordinate our capital management services with family office services such as quarterly household financial statement creation and bill pay. We reserve this coordinated service for households possessing $10MM in assets or more.
Inheriting Wealth
Many people who inherit wealth have limited financial experience. They are often overcome by a mix of emotions ranging from guilt to excitement to fear. We are there to help every step of the way including managing the inheritance in a responsible way that would make their benefactors proud.
